description: This file contains the implementation of a singly linked list data structure, including methods for adding, removing, retrieving elements, and calculating the size of the list.

classes.name: LinkedList
classes.description: A class representing a singly linked list with basic operations such as add, remove, get, and size.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new element to the end of the linked list.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes the first occurrence of an element from the list.

methods.name: size
methods.description: Returns the number of elements in the list.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the element at a specified index in the list.

methods.name: unlink
methods.description: Private method to unlink a node from the list.

methods.name: tail
methods.description: Private companion object method to find the last node of the list.
